query.name: com.txoof.brightspace.enroll.08_students
query.sql:
-- 08_e_s enrol students in sections select distinct 'enrollment' as "type", 'UPDATE' as "action", /* using 7-Users:org_defined_id as child_code */ 'S_'||STUDENTS.STUDENT_NUMBER as "child_code", 'Learner' as "role_name", /* use the following format to ensure that section codes are unique and remain constant even if the teacher is reassigned code: cs_3_SPHYIBS2_3200_D_28636 */
'cs_'||cc.schoolid||'_'||cc.course_number||'_'||cc.TermID||'_'||DECODE(substr(cc.expression, 1, 1), 1, 'A', 2, 'B', 3, 'C', 4, 'D', 5, 'E', 6, 'F', 7, 'G', 8, 'H', 9, 'ADV', 'UNKNOWN')||'_'||cc.sectionid as "parent_code" from /* U_STUDENTSUSERFIELDS U_STUDENTSUSERFIELDS, */ SECTIONS SECTIONS, COURSES COURSES, CC CC, STUDENTS STUDENTS, TERMS TERMS where CC.STUDENTID=STUDENTS.ID and terms.id = cc.termid and COURSES.COURSE_NUMBER=CC.COURSE_NUMBER and SECTIONS.ID=CC.SECTIONID and STUDENTS.ENROLL_STATUS =0 and STUDENTS.GRADE_LEVEL >=5 and CC.TERMID >= case when (EXTRACT(month from sysdate) >= 1 and EXTRACT(month from sysdate) <= 6) THEN (EXTRACT(year from sysdate)-2000+9)*100 when (EXTRACT(month from sysdate) >= 7 and EXTRACT(month from sysdate) <= 12) THEN (EXTRACT(year from sysdate)-2000+10)*100 end /* Only pull courses with firstday that is lessthan or equal to the current date. This prevents adding enrolments changes that are not tracked by powerschool; changes are only tracked on or after the first day of the course. */ and trunc(terms.firstday) <= trunc(sysdate) order by "child_code" asc, "parent_code" asc
